---
title: Flowchart creation
format: html
---

```{r}
source(here::here("R/functions.R"))
targets::tar_config_set(store = here::here("_targets"))
```


```{r}
ls <- targets::tar_read("ls_data") |> 
  create_flowchart(export.path = here::here("Images/flowchart.png")) |> 
  consort:::plot.consort(grViz = TRUE)

writeLines(ls$x$diagram,con = here::here("images/flow.dot"))
```
